First meeting

Published

April 10, 2022

For the first lesson, we’ll set up the projects we’ll work in for the next several meetings. By the end of today, we’ll have:

  • Set up a new Github repo
  • Downloaded the data
  • Cleaned the data
  • Made a visualization

Along the way, we’ll familiarize ourselves with Quarto documents.
